DESCRIPTION: Recombine with a spawned #ySlime, returning the Max HP it took upon #ySplitting.
Lose #b3 HP and spawn a #ySlime minion, who attacks at the start of each turn. While the #ySlime is alive, your Max HP is reduced by #b3.
The next attack deals #b1 more damage per #yGoop, consuming the #yGoop effect and healing #b2 HP. Half of #yGoop is removed at end of turn.
Increases the damage of ALL of your Spawned Slimes.

Attacks for #b4 each turn.
Attacks for #b6 each turn, then increases its damage by #b1.
Attacks for #b2 and grants you #b2 #yBlock each turn.
Attacks for #b2 to ALL enemies each turn.
Attacks for #b1 and applies #b2 #yGoop each turn.
Increases #yBlock each turn. Reduced when you take damage.
Attacks for #b6 and grants you #b4 #yBlock each turn.

Does not attack and is unaffected by Potency. Provides #b1 #yStrength, #b1 Dexterity, and #b2 #yPotency.
Replace with a random new card of your class, regardless of type. It costs #b1 less.
Receives #b10% more damage per card played in a turn.
